sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react'; import { BarChart, Bar, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, AreaChart, Area } from 'recharts'; import { TrendingUp, MessageSquare, Zap, Filter, Calendar, Download, Share2 } from 'lucide-react'; export default function ExorViaDashboard() { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('dashboard'); const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState('1m'); const [selectedMetric, setSelectedMetric] = useState('revenue'); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); // ============ FAKE DATA ============ const analyticsData = [ { date: 'Jan 1', revenue: 4000, users: 2400, engagement: 65 }, { date: 'Jan 8', revenue: 3000, users: 1398, engagement: 58 }, { date: 'Jan 15', revenue: 2000, users: 9800, engagement: 72 }, { date: 'Jan 22', revenue: 2780, users: 3908, engagement: 68 }, { date: 'Jan 29', revenue: 1890, users: 4800, engagement: 74 }, { date: 'Feb 5', revenue: 2390, users: 3800, engagement: 70 }, ]; const kpiData = [ { title: 'Total Revenue', value: '$124,589', change: '+12.5%', icon: 'ðŸ’°', color: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-500' }, { title: 'Active Users', value: '8,234', change: '+5.2%', icon: 'ðŸ‘¥', color: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500' }, { title: 'Engagement Rate', value: '68.4%', change: '+2.1%', icon: 'ðŸ“Š', color: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-500' }, { title: 'Conversion Rate', value: '3.28%', change: '+0.8%', icon: 'ðŸŽ¯', color: 'from-orange-500 to-red-500' }, ]; const textAnalysisResults = [ { id: 1, question: 'What are the top revenue drivers?', answer: 'Our analysis shows that Premium subscriptions account for 45% of revenue, followed by API usage at 32%. Enterprise clients show 3.2x higher lifetime value.' }, { id: 2, question: 'How is user engagement trending?', answer: 'User engagement has improved by 14% over the past month. Mobile users show 28% higher daily active rates compared to desktop users.' }, { id: 3, question: 'What is the churn rate?', answer: 'Current monthly churn is 2.1%, down from 3.4% last quarter. Improved onboarding reduced churn among new users by 45%.' }, ]; const chartTypes = [ { id: 'revenue', title: 'Revenue Trend', icon: 'ðŸ“ˆ', description: 'Track revenue over time' }, { id: 'users', title: 'User Growth', icon: 'ðŸ‘¥', description: 'Monitor active user counts' }, { id: 'engagement', title: 'Engagement Metrics', icon: 'âš¡', description: 'Daily engagement rates' }, { id: 'distribution', title: 'Revenue Distribution', icon: 'ðŸ¥§', description: 'Source breakdown' }, ]; const distributionData = [ { name: 'Premium', value: 45, color: '#3B82F6' }, { name: 'API Usage', value: 32, color: '#8B5CF6' }, { name: 'Enterprise', value: 18, color: '#EC4899' }, { name: 'Other', value: 5, color: '#6B7280' }, ]; // Filter data based on date range const filteredData = useMemo(() => { const sliceMap = { '1w': 1, '1m': 3, '3m': 6 }; return analyticsData.slice(-sliceMap[dateRange]); }, [dateRange]); // ============ HOME PAGE ============ const HomePage = () => (
{/* Header */}

ExorVia

Data Analytics Platform

{/* Hero Section */}

ExorVia Dashboard

Welcome to your comprehensive data analysis platform

{/* Feature Cards */}
{/* Analytics Dashboard Card */}
setCurrentPage('dashboard')} className="bg-slate-800 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-slate-700 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition cursor-pointer group" >
ðŸ“Š

Analytics Dashboard

View comprehensive analytics and KPIs with interactive visualizations and filters.

Go to Dashboard â†’
{/* Text Analysis Card */}
setCurrentPage('text')} className="bg-slate-800 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-slate-700 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition cursor-pointer group" >
âœï¸

Text Analysis

Ask questions about your data and get AI-powered insights and summaries.

Start Analyzing â†’
{/* Infographic Generation Card */}
setCurrentPage('graphs')} className="bg-slate-800 rounded-2xl p-8 border border-slate-700 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition cursor-pointer group" >
ðŸ“ˆ

Infographic Generator

Generate custom charts and visualizations automatically from your questions.

Create Visualizations â†’
{/* Stats Section */}

Quick Stats

{kpiData.map((kpi, idx) => (

{kpi.title}

{kpi.value}

{kpi.change}

))}
); // ============ ANALYTICS DASHBOARD PAGE ============ const AnalyticsDashboard = () => (
{/* Header */}

Analytics Dashboard

Real-time performance metrics

{/* KPI Cards */}
{kpiData.map((kpi, idx) => (
{kpi.icon}

{kpi.title}

{kpi.value}

{kpi.change}

))}
{/* Filters */}
Date Range: {['1w', '1m', '3m'].map(range => ( ))}
{/* Charts Grid */}
{/* Revenue Chart */}

Revenue Trend

{/* Users Chart */}

Active Users

{/* Engagement Chart */}

Engagement Rate

{/* Distribution Pie Chart */}

Revenue Distribution

`${name}: ${value}%`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {distributionData.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
); // ============ TEXT ANALYSIS PAGE ============ const TextAnalysisPage = () => (
{/* Header */}

Text Analysis

AI-powered insights from your data

{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="flex-1 px-4 py-3 bg-slate-900 border border-slate-600 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-white placeholder-slate-500" />
{/* Results */}
{textAnalysisResults.map(result => (

{result.question}

{result.answer}

))}
); // ============ INFOGRAPHICS PAGE ============ const InfographicsPage = () => (
{/* Header */}

Infographic Generator

Create custom visualizations

{/* Chart Type Selection */}
{chartTypes.map(chart => (
setSelectedMetric(chart.id)} className={`rounded-xl p-6 border-2 cursor-pointer transition ${ selectedMetric === chart.id ? 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-500/10' : 'border-slate-700 bg-slate-800 hover:border-slate-600' }`} >
{chart.icon}

{chart.title}

{chart.description}

))}
{/* Generated Visualization */}

{chartTypes.find(c => c.id === selectedMetric)?.title}

{selectedMetric === 'revenue' && ( )} {selectedMetric === 'users' && ( )} {selectedMetric === 'engagement' && ( )} {selectedMetric === 'distribution' && ( `${name}: ${value}%`} outerRadius={100} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {distributionData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} )}
); // ============ RENDER PAGE ============ return ( <> {currentPage === 'home' && } {currentPage === 'dashboard' && } {currentPage === 'text' && } {currentPage === 'graphs' && } ); }
